3: The chamber is open!
Liv, monitor Kamui's condition.
The energy inside the chamber is... being absorbed by Kamui! His M.I.N.D. is overheating!
No, this is too dangerous!
Bianca, wait!
Karen's situation might happen again if this continues! The Tenebrion he's consuming is too powerful—we have to remove the threat before it gets out of hand!
Indeed. Just like Karen's case, we might be able to save Kamui with the same method.
I'll try my best to—
No, I won't let you go through with that. This risk is far greater than Karenina's condition.
But it's still worth a try... Kamui, he is our companion.
R-report! The viral density inside Kamui is shrinking rapidly!
Please, Bianca.
I'm afraid our lives will be much more boring in the future without this guy lightening the mood.
But most importantly, I dislike farewells just as much as I hate fighting my own companions.
I don't like them as well. I was afraid of Lee's situation just now and... s-so, if the same thing happened again... Bianca, please, wait for a bit more.
You...
The viral density has nearly dropped to zero! There won't be a corruption risk if we establish a connection now!
I understand. Then let me join you and see this through to the end.
No, I'll stay on guard duty. I'll pray for your success.
Commandant, your orders!

2: Everyone, prepare for the final battle.
